fields.name: aminoAcid
fields.description: A single amino acid.

fields.name: percent
fields.description: Percent (range: 0 - 100) of this amino acid in the mutation.

fields.name: numReads
fields.description: The number of reads for this amino acid in the mutation.

fields.name: gene
fields.description: Sequence gene and the reference sequence.

fields.name: firstAA
fields.description: The first aligned position (start from 1) in protein relative to the reference sequence.

fields.name: lastAA
fields.description: The last aligned position (start from 1) in protein relative to the reference sequence.

fields.name: firstNA

fields.name: lastNA
fields.description: The last aligned position (start from 1) in DNA relative to the input sequence.

fields.name: matchPcnt
fields.description: The match percentage of input sequence aligned to the reference sequence.

fields.name: size
fields.description: The amino acid size of this sequence without unsequenced region (Ns).

fields.name: prettyPairwise
fields.description: Formatted pairwise output of the aligned sequence.

fields.name: alignedNAs
fields.description: Aligned DNA sequence without insertions and insertion gaps.

fields.name: alignedAAs
fields.description: Aligned protein sequence without insertions and insertion gaps. Mixtures are represented as "X".

fields.name: adjustedAlignedNAs
fields.description: adjusted aligned DNA sequence without insertions and insertion gaps.

args.name: targetStrain
args.description: Sequences alignment target strain.

fields.name: adjustedAlignedAAs

args.name: targetStrain

fields.name: mutations
fields.description: All mutations found in the aligned sequence.

args.name: mutationType

args.name: customList

fields.name: deletionCount

fields.name: stopCodonCount

fields.name: ambiguousMutationCount

fields.name: apobecMutationCount

fields.name: others

fields.name: distancePcnt

fields.name: mutationType

fields.name: commentType

fields.name: comments

fields.name: SIR

fields.description: Readable resistance level defined by the algorithm for the drug.

fields.name: minPrevalence

fields.name: isBelowMinPrevalenceThreshold

fields.name: mutationCount
fields.description: Number of mutations without counting unsequenced regions and multiple continuous deletions

fields.name: unusualMutationCount
fields.description: Number of unusual mutations without counting unsequenced regions and multiple continuous deletions

fields.name: histogram
fields.description: Histogram data for sequence reads.

args.name: pcntLowerLimit
args.description: Percent lower limit of filtering codon reads (range: 0-100).

args.name: pcntUpperLimit
args.description: Percent lower limit of filtering codon reads (range: 0-100).

args.name: numBins
args.description: Number of bins wanted in this histogram. (either `numBins` or `binTicks` must be provided)

args.name: binTicks
args.description: Bin ticks wanted in this histogram. (either `numBins` or `binTicks` must be provided)

args.name: cumulative
args.description: Generate cumulative histogram data instead.

args.name: aggregatesBy
args.description: Aggregation option.

fields.name: unsequencedRegions
fields.description: The unsequenced regions of this aligned gene sequence.

fields.name: display
fields.description: The display subtype(s) with the distance percent.

fields.name: displayWithoutDistance
fields.description: The display subtype(s) without the distance percent.

fields.name: subtype
fields.description: The original subtype found by comparison. The value of this field is UNPROCESSED. You probably want to use field `display` for the final result.

fields.name: displaySubtypes
fields.description: There are several rules applied for subtype displaying. This field lists subtypes that were used in constructing the final result in `display` and `displayWithoutDistance`.

fields.name: firstNA
fields.description: The first compared/matched NA position in HXB2.

fields.name: lastNA
fields.description: The last compared/matched NA position in HXB2.

fields.name: distance
fields.description: The distance between bound sequence and coressponding reference. Noted that 0 <= distance <= 1.

fields.name: distancePcnt
fields.description: The distance between bound sequence and coressponding reference. Noted that 0% <= distancePcnt <= 100%.

fields.name: referenceAccession
fields.description: Accession number of the reference being compared.

fields.name: referenceCountry
fields.description: Country where this reference sequence was collected.

fields.name: referenceYear
fields.description: Year this reference sequence was collected.

fields.name: discordanceList
fields.description: A full list of HXB2 positions that present with discordance.

types.name: HIVClassificationLevel
types.description: Classification level of genotypes: species, group or subtype.

fields.name: indexName
fields.description: Short name of current species, group, or subtype. Also used for indexing internally.

fields.name: displayName
fields.description: Full name of current species, group, or subtype.

fields.name: classificationLevel
fields.description: Classification level of the subtype.

fields.name: gene
fields.description: Mutation gene.

fields.name: reference
fields.description: Amino acid reference at this gene sequence position.

fields.name: position
fields.description: Position of the mutation.

fields.name: displayAAs
fields.description: The mutated AA(s) with possibly inserted AA(s).

fields.name: AAs
fields.description: The mutated AA(s) with possibly inserted AA(s). Highly ambiguous mixture is not replaced to X.

fields.name: unusualAAs
fields.description: The unusual AA(s).

fields.name: displayAAChars
fields.description: A list of AAs.

fields.name: AAChars
fields.description: A list of AAs. Highly ambiguous mixture is not replaced to X.

fields.name: triplet
fields.description: The mutated codon when the mutation is extracting from an aligned sequence.

fields.name: insertedNAs
fields.description: The inserted codon(s) when the mutation is extracting from an aligned sequence.

fields.name: isInsertion
fields.description: The mutation is an insertion or not.

fields.name: isDeletion
fields.description: The mutation is a deletion or not.

fields.name: isIndel
fields.description: The mutation is an insertion/deletion, or not.

fields.name: isAmbiguous
fields.description: The mutation is a highly ambiguous mutation or not.

fields.name: isApobecMutation
fields.description: The mutation is a signature APOBEC-mediated G-to-A hypermutation or not.

fields.name: isApobecDRM
fields.description: The mutation is a drug resistance mutation (DRM) might be caused by APOBEC-mediated G-to-A hypermutation or not.

fields.name: isUnsequenced
fields.description: If the mutation is from unsequenced region.

fields.name: isDRM
fields.description: If the mutation is a drug resistance mutation (DRM) or not.

fields.name: DRMDrugClass
fields.description: If the mutation is a drug resistance mutation (DRM), which drug class it belongs to.

fields.name: hasStop
fields.description: The mutation contains stop codon or not.

fields.name: isUnusual
fields.description: The mutation is a low prevalence (unusual) mutation or not.

fields.name: isSDRM
fields.description: The mutation is a Surveillance Drug Resistance Mutation (SDRM) or not.

fields.name: SDRMDrugClass
fields.description: If the mutation is an SDRM, which drug class it belongs to.

fields.name: TSMDrugClass
fields.description: If the mutation is a TSM, which drug class it belongs to.

fields.name: types
fields.description: Ordered list of mutation type(s). List size can be larger than 1 when the mutation is a mixture.

fields.name: primaryType
fields.description: Primary type of the mutation.

fields.name: comments
fields.description: Mutation comments.

fields.name: text
fields.description: Formatted text of the mutation (without gene).

fields.name: shortText
fields.description: Formatted short text of the mutation (without gene).

fields.name: totalReads
fields.description: Total reads at this position (only available for SequenceReadsAnalysis)

fields.name: allAAReads
fields.description: A list of read count / prevalence for each amino acid of this mutation.

types.name: MutationPrevalence
types.description: Prevalence data for a single mutation.

fields.name: AA
fields.description: The amino acid at this position.

fields.name: subtype
fields.description: Subtype this prevalence belongs to.

fields.name: totalNaive
fields.description: Total number of naive samples which contain the mutation position.

fields.name: frequencyNaive
fields.description: Total number of naive samples which contain the mutation.

fields.name: percentageNaive
fields.description: Proportion of certain mutation occured in the naive samples which contain that position. Equals to 100 * frequencyNaive / totalNaive.

fields.name: totalTreated
fields.description: Total number of treated samples which contain the mutation position.

fields.name: frequencyTreated
fields.description: Total number of treated samples which contain the mutation.

fields.name: percentageTreated
fields.description: Proportion of certain mutation occured in the treated samples which contain that position. Equals to 100 * frequencyTreated / totalTreated.

types.name: MutationPrevalenceByAA
types.description: Prevalence data for a single AA (or ins/deletion).

fields.name: AA
fields.description: The amino acid.

fields.name: subtypes
fields.description: Prevalence data of each subtype.

types.name: MutationPrevalenceSubtype
types.description: Main subtype that mutation prevalence supported.

fields.name: name
fields.description: Subtype name.

fields.name: stats
fields.description: Sbutype statistics by genes.

args.name: includeGenes
args.description: Genes to be included in the results

fields.name: gene
fields.description: Gene the statistic belongs to.

fields.name: totalNaive
fields.description: Total number of naive samples.

fields.name: totalTreated
fields.description: Total number of treated samples.

enumValues.name: APOBEC
enumValues.description: List only mutations which are APOBEC-mediated G-to-A hypermutation.

enumValues.name: APOBEC_DRM
enumValues.description: List only drug resistance mutations which are APOBEC-mediated G-to-A hypermutation.

enumValues.name: DRM
enumValues.description: List only mutations which are drug resistance mutation (DRM).

enumValues.name: DRP
enumValues.description: List all mutations at DRM positions (no need to be DRMs).

enumValues.name: notDRM
enumValues.description: List only mutations which are not drug resistance mutation (DRM).

enumValues.name: SEQUENCED_ONLY
enumValues.description: Remove all unsequenced positions.

enumValues.name: PI_DRM
enumValues.description: List only mutations which are PI DRM.

enumValues.name: NRTI_DRM
enumValues.description: List only mutations which are NRTI DRM.

enumValues.name: NNRTI_DRM
enumValues.description: List only mutations which are NNRTI DRM.

enumValues.name: INSTI_DRM
enumValues.description: List only mutations which are INSTI DRM.

enumValues.name: SDRM
enumValues.description: List only mutations which are surveillance drug resistance mutations (SDRM).

enumValues.name: notSDRM
enumValues.description: List only mutations which are not sruveillance drug resistance mutation (SDRM).

enumValues.name: PI_SDRM
enumValues.description: List only mutations which are PI SDRM.

enumValues.name: NRTI_SDRM
enumValues.description: List only mutations which are NRTI SDRM.

enumValues.name: NNRTI_SDRM
enumValues.description: List only mutations which are NNRTI SDRM.

enumValues.name: INSTI_SDRM
enumValues.description: List only mutations which are INSTI SDRM.

enumValues.name: TSM
enumValues.description: List only mutations which are treatment-selected mutations (TSM).

enumValues.name: notTSM
enumValues.description: List only mutations which are not treatment-selected mutations (TSM).

enumValues.name: PI_TSM
enumValues.description: List only mutations which are PI TSM.

enumValues.name: NRTI_TSM
enumValues.description: List only mutations which are NRTI TSM.

enumValues.name: NNRTI_TSM
enumValues.description: List only mutations which are NNRTI TSM.

enumValues.name: INSTI_TSM
enumValues.description: List only mutations which are INSTI TSM.

enumValues.name: GENE_PR
enumValues.description: Use `includeGenes=PR instead.

enumValues.name: GENE_RT
enumValues.description: Use `includeGenes=RT instead.

enumValues.name: GENE_IN
enumValues.description: Use `includeGenes=IN instead.

enumValues.name: TYPE_MAJOR
enumValues.description: Use `mutationType=Major` instead.

enumValues.name: TYPE_ACCESSORY
enumValues.description: Use `mutationType=Accessory` instead.

enumValues.name: TYPE_NRTI
enumValues.description: Use `mutationType=NRTI` instead.

enumValues.name: TYPE_NNRTI
enumValues.description: Use `mutationType=NNRTI` instead.

enumValues.name: TYPE_OTHER
enumValues.description: Use `mutationType=Other` instead.

enumValues.name: AMBIGUOUS
enumValues.description: List all highly-ambiguous (HBDVN) mutations.

enumValues.name: STOPCODON
enumValues.description: List only mutations with stop codon(s).

enumValues.name: CUSTOMLIST
enumValues.description: Accept a custom list of mutations and find the intersects.

fields.description: The amino acid is a drug resistance mutation (DRM) might be caused by APOBEC-mediated G-to-A hypermutation.

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: An identifiable name for identifying the result from the returning list.

inputFields.name: strain
inputFields.description: Strain of this sequence.

inputFields.name: allReads
inputFields.description: List of all reads belong to this sequence.

inputFields.name: untranslatedRegions
inputFields.description: Optional consensus information of untranslated regions to be added in assembled consensus sequence.

inputFields.name: maxMixtureRate
inputFields.description: The maximum allowed mixture percentage cutoff. Default to one if this field was left empty or had a negative number specified. Valid value ranges from 0 to 1.

inputFields.name: minPrevalence
inputFields.description: The minimal prevalence cutoff to apply on each **codon**. Default to zero if this field was left empty or had a negative number specified. Valid value ranges from 0 to 1.

inputFields.name: minCodonReads
inputFields.description: The minimal read depth for **codons**. Default to one if this field was left empty or had a negative number specified.

inputFields.name: minPositionReads
inputFields.description: The minimal read depth for **positions**. Default to one if this field was left empty or had a negative number specified.

fields.description: Version text.

fields.name: publishDate
fields.description: Publish date of this version.

fields.description: Short name of this strain.

fields.description: Full name of this strain.

inputFields.description: Name of the sequence.

inputFields.name: sequence
inputFields.description: The sequence itself as a string.

fields.description: The individual unsequenced regions.

fields.description: Total size of all unsequenced regions.

inputFields.description: NA Consensus of this untranslated region.

types.name: __DirectiveLocation
types.description: An enum describing valid locations where a directive can be placed

enumValues.name: QUERY
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on queries.

enumValues.name: MUTATION
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on mutations.

enumValues.name: FIELD
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on fields.

enumValues.name: FRAGMENT_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on fragment definitions.

enumValues.name: FRAGMENT_SPREAD
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on fragment spreads.

enumValues.name: INLINE_FRAGMENT
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on inline fragments.

enumValues.name: VARIABLE_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on variable definitions.

enumValues.name: SCHEMA
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on a schema SDL definition.

enumValues.name: SCALAR
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on a scalar SDL definition.

enumValues.name: OBJECT
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on an object SDL definition.

enumValues.name: FIELD_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on a field SDL definition.

enumValues.name: ARGUMENT_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on a field argument SDL definition.

enumValues.name: INTERFACE
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on an interface SDL definition.

enumValues.name: UNION
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on an union SDL definition.

enumValues.name: ENUM
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on an enum SDL definition.

enumValues.name: ENUM_VALUE
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on an enum value SDL definition.

enumValues.name: INPUT_OBJECT
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on an input object SDL definition.

enumValues.name: INPUT_FIELD_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on an input object field SDL definition.

types.name: __Schema
types.description: A GraphQL Introspection defines the capabilities of a GraphQL server. It exposes all available types and directives on the server, the entry points for query, mutation, and subscription operations.

fields.name: types
fields.description: A list of all types supported by this server.

fields.name: queryType
fields.description: The type that query operations will be rooted at.

fields.name: mutationType
fields.description: If this server supports mutation, the type that mutation operations will be rooted at.

fields.name: directives
fields.description: 'A list of all directives supported by this server.

fields.name: subscriptionType
fields.description: 'If this server support subscription, the type that subscription operations will be rooted at.

types.name: __TypeKind
types.description: An enum describing what kind of type a given __Type is

enumValues.name: SCALAR
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a scalar. 'specifiedByUrl' is a valid field

enumValues.name: OBJECT
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an object. `fields` and `interfaces` are valid fields.

enumValues.name: INTERFACE
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an interface. `fields` and `possibleTypes` are valid fields.

enumValues.name: UNION
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a union. `possibleTypes` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: ENUM
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an enum. `enumValues` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: INPUT_OBJECT
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an input object. `inputFields` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: LIST
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a list. `ofType` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: NON_NULL
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a non-null. `ofType` is a valid field.

directives.name: include
directives.description: Directs the executor to include this field or fragment only when the `if` argument is true

args.name: if
args.description: Included when true.

directives.name: skip
directives.description: Directs the executor to skip this field or fragment when the `if`'argument is true.

args.name: if
args.description: Skipped when true.

directives.name: deprecated
directives.description: Marks the field or enum value as deprecated

args.name: reason
args.description: The reason for the deprecation

directives.name: specifiedBy
directives.description: Exposes a URL that specifies the behaviour of this scalar.

args.name: url
args.description: The URL that specifies the behaviour of this scalar.
